articles.description: Real Madrid show they are the masters of the Champions League high-wire act as Borussia Dortmund are beaten at Wembley, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Champions League final: Real Madrid pull off another high-wire act to win

articles.description: Iga Swiatek takes just 40 minutes to register a crushing 6-0 6-0 win over Anastasia Potapova and reach the French Open quarter-finals.
articles.title: French Open 2024 results: Iga Swiatek wins 6-0 6-0 in 40 minutes to reach quarter-finals

articles.description: Novak Djokovic reaches the French Open fourth round with a five-set win over Lorenzo Musetti that ends at 03:07 local time in Paris.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Novak Djokovic beats Lorenzo Musetti in five-set epic

articles.description: Aaron Jones hits an unbeaten 94 as T20 World Cup co-hosts USA beat Canada by seven wickets in a pulsating tournament opener in Texas.
articles.title: T20 World Cup 2024: USA beat Canada in tournament opener

articles.description: England goalkeeper Mary Earps has been forced to withdraw from Sarina Wiegman's squad for Tuesday's Euro 2025 qualifier in France.
articles.title: Mary Earps: Man Utd goalkeeper withdraws from England squad with hip injury

articles.description: Daniel Dubois beat Filip Hrgovic and Deontay Wilder lost to Zhilei Zhang as Queensberry beat Matchroom in the five versus five team event.
articles.title: Queensberry vs Matchroom 5v5: Wins for Dubois & Zhang as Queensberry beat Matchroom...

articles.description: Real Madrid head coach Carlo Ancelotti says the Champions League has given him "fantastic happiness" following their 2-0 win over Borussia Dortmund in the final.
articles.title: Carlo Ancelotti says Champions League has given him 'fantastic happiness' after 2-0 victory over Borussia Dortmund in final

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from United States vs Korea Republic in the Friendlies Women
articles.title: United States vs Korea Republic: Friendlies Women - BBC Sport

articles.description: Jude Bellingham says he "couldn't have dreamed it better" after ending his first season with Real Madrid by winning the Champions League.
articles.title: Dortmund 0-2 Real Madrid: Jude Bellingham 'couldn't have dreamed it better'

articles.description: Islam Makhachev submits Dustin Poirier in the fifth round of a gruelling contest to retain his lightweight title at UFC 302 in New Jersey.
articles.title: UFC 302: Islam Makhachev submits Dustin Poirier in gruelling contest to retain lightweight title
